The newspaper ad: The expert refers to the newspaper ad run by the Milwaukee Police Association about contract talks with the city. This ad is mentioned as evidence of the claim being made.
Contract negotiations: The expert mentions the ongoing contract negotiations between the Milwaukee Police Association and the City of Milwaukee. These negotiations are crucial in verifying the authenticity of the claim.
Reference to financial sacrifices: The expert highlights the reference made by the Milwaukee Police Association to the financial sacrifices worth millions of dollars. This reference is presented as evidence to support the claim.
Concessions offered by the union: The expert mentions that the MPA president, Mike Crivello, reiterated the concessions that the union had already offered. These concessions, including $12 million in immediate savings through 2011 and $184 million in savings over the next 25 years, are presented as aspects employed to verify the claim.
